Header: BUS TOPPLES IN KEKEIRAWA INJURING NINE PEOPLE
Content: Nine people were injured and hospitalized after a private bus toppled in the Kekirawa - Mankadawala area after veering off the road. The police spokespersonâ€™s office stated a group of people traveling this morning from Gampaha to a funeral in Horowpathana met with an accident. The injured have been admitted to Anuradhapura, Dambulla and Kekirawa hospitals.
